entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
